name: Gmail Black Theme
description: Turns the default dark Gmail theme black. Enable the dark theme in the Gmail settings for it to work. Also turns the loading screen black. If you're looking to just turn the loading screen dark, try my other theme here
additional_info:
Update 1/23/19: Made more parts of the UI black, including email pages, sidebar, context menus, the filter menu, and the on-screen keyboard.
Update 1/28/19: Fixed inverted attachments.
